title: Gangplank's W
body:
Please rename Remove Scurvy to Citrus Delish. {{champion:41}} 

Eat oranges and be K!

replies.body: Plot twist, he eats Teemo shrooms.
You best believe limes are of citrus nature as well.

it says gangplank eats a citrus fruit, why does everyone assume oranges? huh? 

he eats lemons cos sour and gets him hyphy enough to get out of sticky situations. An orange couldn't do that.

Proof that citrus r good 4 u kay

Shot thru the head have some citrus its ok now i propose game wide citrus ban and censor on word citrus so it appear as asterix when filter is on
